"""
    triginterp(t, y)

Construct the trigonometric interpolant for the points defined by
vectors `t` and `y`.
"""
function triginterp(t, y)
    N = length(t)

    τ(x) =
        if x == 0
            return 1.0
        else
            denom = isodd(N) ? N * sin(π * x / 2) : N * tan(π * x / 2)
            return sin(N * π * x / 2) / denom
        end

    return function (x)
        return sum(y[k] * τ(x - t[k]) for k in eachindex(y))
    end
end
